rev_title: their customer service is wonderful. Now
rev_body: Let me just start by saying, ANY perfume purchased directly from Amazon LLC (Prime) is legit. Just because you purchase from Amazon website, does not mean you are buying directly from Amazon itself. Many sellers go THROUGH Amazon to sell their merchandise. Personally, I would never buy perfume from any of these sellers because perfumes could be watered down, counterfeit, etc. & perfume is just way too expensive for me to gamble with. I trust Amazon and have never had a problem with receiving anything but REAL perfume. Also, their customer service is wonderful. Now, on to the product...Vera Wang Princess is a beautifully developed perfume, and way more complex than anything a middle schooler or tween would wear. It is surprisingly more mature than one would expect. I am 20, and I do not BY ANY MEANS wear anything old ladyish. While i do try to keep a variety of perfumes on hand, I cannot stand anything too florally or musky. Also, I am pregnant and Princess is one of the few perfumes I can wear almost daily without becoming nauseous. I am one of those people who perfumes do not last long at all on my skin. They also don't do much developing once there. I can smell Princess on my clothes weeks after applying it. I wore it to work last night (I do 12 hour shifts at a nursing home) and could not only smell it the entire time I was there, but after I got home as well giving it a total longevity of 16 hours on my skin. People within about a foot of me could smell me, but by no means was the scent overwhelming or offensive. Vera Wang's princess is for all ages. It is girly, feminine, and a bit innocent but never juvenile. It is a good signature or everyday perfume. Could easily be worn on a date or any occasion, really. I cannot say enough good things about this perfume. Amazon has the best price.
